headline: Asian shares are mixed after US stocks tumble on worries over tariffs
summary: BANGKOK — Asian shares were mixed on Monday after U.S. stocks fell sharply as reports showed the economy may be suffering as consumers and businesses fret over President Donald Trump’s policies....
